post.body: hey back! i'm following the Morrone family craziness completely now :p @sixuntilme
but i do think it's AWESOME you're doing this and i will def. be promoting it left and right for you!
i would! but i can't fundraise for another thing or i'll be shot by everyone who knows me!
thanks for the ideas! @YoungFree is an interesting concept itself, even if they're not maximizing Twitter potential
if I hadn't clicked on @dmorrone's tweet stream to see the root of that last tweet, i would be seriously worried for you :p
thanks! i think someone's insanity is rubbing off on me a bit :p
i truly think LCT is amazing! of course, i have had the best seat in the house for the past 4 years, but it's still true :P
is my new favorite person!
oi that's crazy. my number 1 pet peeve is sites that it's a) hard to find the contact info and b) have no email listed.
do you have any links to half-marathon training schedules?
wow thanks! very thought provoking. i'm trying to get some pre-thesis research going, this definitely helps!
hey now :p i have an informal 24 hour down time when I hit home to recuperate
you mean the 30th? yes :p
congrats grad! :p officially announced http://tinyurl.com/6qutfl
haha! no...no. gf = gluten free in 99.99% of my tweets :)
how is paris??? :) miss you! i found gf pancake mix and gf cake mix in a box today! :D
were you going to mention i keep tweeting your name wrong?! sorry :)
i think communication is the cornerstone of (and is) PR. care to share? i'm hearing otherwise on here tonight
sure thing! great tweeting with you
but in this sense, doing so is so much better than sitting around and complaining/moping/etc and you get so much in return
hooray we're growing! sounds good so far.
type 1. Doing something for someone else is better than anything you would do for yourself!
hey! any update on the count for awesome Hsv Tweetup?
bummer on being glutenated! Merry Christmas though :)
oh,almost forgot: http://tinyurl.com/98lwus here's Paris! haha. if I get Ramsey *knock on wood* i'll be doing more research!
i'm so with you! haha. probably best way to do it is road trip with a full car of people to split the gas!
haha exactly the same reason I can't drive from Tuscaloosa to Atlanta for conferences easily
nice :p I wish! nothing happens around here, but i'm harassing some people into a tweetup on the 30th at least :)
sorry, that was sarcasm :p
hey, 1 in Atlanta is 1 more than the ones in Huntsville :p
is this philosophical? a search for the soul-searchers ? :p
GREAT! texture is almost like a sweet cornbread, but w/ chocolate frosting it is delicious :) :) i'm in love!
yahoo! 1 hour after run = 147 :) let's see if this holds up overnight?
who are some companies on Twitter doing good jobs? I know @wholefoods @ScottMonty - who else?
if I click on myBama enough, will my grades magically appear?!
Huntsville Dec. 18-21 : the best christmas event in town! Come see the Living Christmas Tree! http://fbchsv.org/lct/index.html
has anyone seen any 'scholarly' research or work on social media?
in dire need of grocery shopping - only gf in the house is GF Rice chex. not exactly what I want to eat for 3 weeks at home.
Celiac disease and type 1 diabetes have genes in common: described at http://tinyurl.com/6htjcs
i just don't think snow belongs in Alabama :p
i just had pancakes. real pancakes. for the first time in over a year. did i mention they were 1) gf 2) delicious and 3) homemade by my dad?
i have THE greatest dad in the world.
last-minute work that i forgot to send in last night :/
2nd publix in town has: pancake mix AND cake mix in a BOX!!! gf has returned to the 21st century style of living :D :D :D
night everyone
still really regretting the loss of my hair. cutting off this much = not a good idea.
what is your definition of PR?
who doesn't love wordpress's snow on the dashboard?! beautiful snowflakes while remaining indoors and warm - what's not to like?
i have a feeling @splashfantastic is going to get on to me again about Twitter usage.the only question is how long it takes her to notice :p
is there anything more obnoxious than someone walking by carrying a stack of wrapped presents but they won't tell you who they're for? :p
hoping everyone makes it safely home tonight and that the storms have subsided!
have officially read THE christmas story (night b4 christmas)per tradition. now, getting ready to keep mom company watching White Christmas
you know you're getting old when you ask for a car phone charger for christmas - and nothing else
wishing my brother(s) were home for christmas eve
it's christmas eve and there's another monsoon approaching. few days ago, it was 20 degrees. only in Hsvegas :)
thanks to my friends (@ariedana @LoriMiller_WHNT) I knew it was supposed to rain/storm. who needs the weather channel? :p
i'm creating a new Christmas tradition for our family! peppermint hot chocolates from starbucks before going to look at lights.
it's finally beginning to feel like Christmas! custard is being made :)
rest of day plans: helping dad make custard (yum!), going to look at lights, traditional eve dinner, and watching white christmas with mom!
yippee (sarcasm) RT @waff48 strong storms are expected to move through N. Ala between 3-4 p.m.
